snippet.title: Truck & Logistics Simulator | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/873840/Truck_and_Logistics_Simulator/

Truck & Logistics Simulator is a vehicle simulation game where you are tasked to perform logistics from beginning to end in single or multiplayer. 

Take control of more than 20 unique vehicles to perform complex loading tasks and deliver the diverse cargo directly to your customers. Master all the individual logistics vehicles like forklifts, cranes, telescopic handlers, wheel loaders and more to load up your vans, pickups and heavy trucks.

Follow us.
Discord: https://discord.gg/PCjxFjs

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TruckAndLogisticsSimulator
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Simula_Games
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/simula_games
